title: Team Alertix won first place at InnovateExpo 2024 🎉🏆
description: Huge congratulations to the project demonstration team Alertix for winning first place at InnovateExpo 2024 in Kathmandu! 🎉🏆Presented by TechAspire College and organized by Khudkila Pvt. Ltd., this victory is a testament to your hard work, innovation, and dedication. We're incredibly proud of your achievement!

title: Fair Play Award at InnovateExpo 2024! 🤖👏
description: A big shout-out to the Robo Soccer team The Flames for securing the Fair Play Award at InnovateExpo 2024! 🤖👏Your sportsmanship and teamwork stood out, and this recognition reflects your commitment to excellence. Well done on this fantastic achievement!
